The first equation

\begin{align}
\mathit{New Cases_{i,t}} = \beta_0 + \beta_1\mathit{Stringency}_{i,t-7} +\beta_2\mathit{Stringency}_{i,t-7}^{2} +\beta_3\left(\mathit{Sringency_{i,t-7}} \times \mathit{SocialCapital_{i,t}}\right) + \epsilon_{i,t}
\end{align}

The second equation

\begin{align}
\mathit{New Cases_{t}} = \beta_0 &+ \beta_1\mathit{Stringency}_{t-7}
+\beta_2\mathit{Stringency}_{t-7}^{2} 
+\beta_3\mathit{SocialCaptial_{t}} \notag \\
&+\beta_4\left(\mathit{Stringency_{t-7}} \times \mathit{SocialCapital_{t}}\right) + \epsilon_{t}
\end{align}

the third equation

\begin{align}
\mathit{New Cases_{t}} = \beta_0 &+ \beta_1\mathit{Stringency}_{t-7}
+\beta_2\mathit{Stringency}_{t-7}^{2} \notag
+\beta_3\mathit{SocialCaptial_{t}} \\
&+\beta_4\left(\mathit{Stringency_{t-7}} \times \mathit{SocialCapital_{t}}\right) \notag \\
&+ \left(\sum\gamma_i\mathit{X_i}\right)_{t}
+ \epsilon_{t}
\end{align}
